titleStmt.title: SII 13.182: original edition by G.V. Srinivasa Rao
No. 182. (A.R. No. 683 of 1909.) TIRUNEḌUṄGAḶAM, TRICHINOPOLY TALUK, TRICHINOPOLY DISTRICT. ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE GAṆĒŚA SHRINE, NEḌUṄGAḶANĀTHASVĀMIN TEMPLE.

summary.p: The inscription registers a sale of land as kuḍinīkkā-dēvadāna by the sabhā, the ūr and the dēvakarmis of the temple at Tiruneḍuṅgaḷam, a dēvadāna in Kavira-nāḍu, for 30 kāśu received by them as kaṟpūra-vilai for the temple, to Kambaṉ Maṇiyaṉ, the headman of Śūralūr, with the stipulation that after clearing the forest and reclaiming the land he was to pay 150 kalam of paddy annually as kāṇikkaḍaṉ to the temple. The land was to be irrigated by the same stream called Kumiḻiyāṟu which also irrigated the temple lands. Mention is made of a certain standard grain-measure (ūrkkāl) called Kōdukulavaṉ. The characters belong to about the 10th century A.D., and from the reference made in it to the officer Rājarāja-Brahmamārāya, the record may be assigned to Rājarāja I. Tiruvēḷpūr (Tirugōkarṇam) of No. 174 above was also in Kavira-nāḍu.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . rācakecaripanmaṟku yāṇṭu 8Āvatu kaviranā
ṭṭu perumāṉār tevatānam tiruneṭuṅkaḷattu sabhai
yomu muromum devakanmikaḷomum cūralūr kiḻavaṉ kampaṉ maṇiya
ṉukkuk kuṭinikkāt tevatānamāka viṟṟukkuṭutta nilamāvatu Ittevatānam
kiḷḷivayal paḻanilattukku vaṭakkiṟkālukkuk kiḻpāṟkellai māṅkānallū
r Ellaikku meṟkum putuvayakkuḷattu Uṭkaṭai niroṭukālukku vaṭakkum
Ikkuḷattu nirkkoppukku meṟkkum tenpāṟkellai mātevan mayakkan
kaṇṇāṟṟu teṉvarappuk kottam kiḻakkumeṟku Ellaiyaḷavum Itaṉukku va
ṭakkum melpāṟkellai vikkirāṇanallūrellaikkuk kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai puttā
mpūruṭaiyān Araiyan caturaviṭaṅkaṉnilattukku teṟkum Innila muḷḷila moḻiviṉṟiye kāṭu ve
ṭṭikkoṇṭu Ucarppili Ucarkkavum kuḻippili kuḻikkavum peṟuvānāka Ittevarkke Ikkāṭṭukku kaṟpūra
vilaikku rājarājabrahmamārāyar cikāryattu Ittevar paṇṭārattu vaitta kācu 3 10 Ik kācu mup
patukkum viṟṟukkuṭuttu Etirāmāṇṭumutal Ittevarkke kāṇikkaṭan Āṇṭuvarai yaḷappa tāna I
100 5 10 Innellu ṉūṟṟaympatin kalamum Ūrkkāl kotukulavanāl Aḷappatākavum te
nnāṟṟilniṉṟu kiḷḷivayalukkup pāynta kumiḻiyāṟe Innilattukku nirkkintavāḻuṟai yāl
pāyappeṟuvatākavum Innilam vilai yoṟṟi pratigrahattukkurittāka candrādittaval niṟ
